gmi
Class MethodTable

java.lang.Object
  gmi.MethodTable

public class MethodTable
extends java.lang.Object

MethodTable object maintains all the method define in server application based on particular interface implmented by application, and provide these mehtods to ServerSideProxy to invoke method on request from requestor.

Author:
Gurvinder Singh
